name: Fartrol
description:
You think this mask is for corona? Well, think again!

And, if you think that you are in control...if I were you, I would reconsider. 

You farts are out of control: it's totally understandable. Honestly, it happens. But having the game going out of control, and also the character that you are playing; I bet it's too much for you. Can you handle Fartrol, out of control?

This is our first game jam
